title: Professional YouTube & Rumble View Bot
description: This Actor automates viewing videos on YouTube and Rumble with advanced controls. Define your viewing tasks below. For detailed guidance and advanced usage, please consult the README.

tasks.sectionDescription: Define the list of videos to watch. Each item in the list is an object representing one viewing task.
tasks.title: List of Video Tasks
tasks.description: REQUIRED: An array of objects. Each object must contain a 'url' and can optionally include 'watchType', 'refererUrl', and 'searchKeywords' to override global settings for that specific task.

watchTimePercentage.title: Watch Time Percentage
watchTimePercentage.description: The percentage of the video's total duration to watch. This is a global setting for all tasks.

autoSkipAds.title: Automatically Skip Ads
autoSkipAds.description: If enabled, the Actor will attempt to click the 'Skip Ad' button as soon as it becomes available.

skipAdsAfter.title: Wait Before Skipping Ad (seconds range)
skipAdsAfter.description: A random time to wait before trying to skip an ad, even if the button is visible. Provide one value for a fixed wait, or two values for a random range (e.g., [5, 10]).

maxSecondsAds.title: Maximum Ad Watch Time (seconds)
maxSecondsAds.description: The absolute maximum time to spend in the ad-handling logic before proceeding, even if an ad is unskippable.

useProxies.title: Use Proxies
useProxies.description: Enable to use proxies for all connections. It is highly recommended to keep this enabled to avoid being blocked.

proxyCountry.title: Apify Proxy Country
proxyCountry.description: Select a specific country for Apify's residential proxies. Leave empty to use any available country.

proxyGroups.title: Apify Proxy Groups
proxyGroups.description: Specify Apify Proxy groups to use (e.g., RESIDENTIAL, DATACENTER).

customProxyUrls.title: Custom Proxy URLs (optional)
customProxyUrls.description: Provide a list of your own proxy URLs to use instead of Apify Proxy. The format should be http://user:password@host:port.

concurrency.title: Maximum Concurrency
concurrency.description: The maximum number of browser instances to run in parallel. Higher values require more memory.

headless.title: Run in Headless Mode
headless.description: Run the browser in headless mode (no visible UI). For debugging, you can set this to false to see the browser.

timeout.title: Navigation Timeout (seconds)
timeout.description: Maximum time to wait for a page to navigate and load.
